data.comment: The match has started at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
In the minute 1, Throw-in Shimizu.
Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
In the minute 4, Renato Augusto (Shimizu) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Keita Nakamura of Shimizu gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 6, Masaaki Toma awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
Free kick for Shimizu in the half of Kashiwa.
Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
In the minute 10, Masaaki Toma signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Shimizu's half.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Shimizu at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Kashiwa.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
Hiroto Goya gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kashiwa.
In the minute 16, Throw-in high up the field for Kashiwa in Kashiwa.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 18, Masaaki Toma signals a Shimizu throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 22, Kashiwa needs to be cautious. Shimizu have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Shimizu.
Masaaki Toma awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 25, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashiwa.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Goal kick for Shimizu at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
In the minute 27, Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Shimizu.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kashiwa are pushing forward but Hiroto Goya's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 29, Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
In Kashiwa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 32, In Kashiwa, Valdo (Shimizu) misses the target with a header.
Masaaki Toma awards the home team a throw-in.
Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Shimizu.
In the minute 36, Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
Kenta Nishizawa for Shimizu is whistled offside.
Free kick Shimizu.
In the minute 37, Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
Masaaki Toma signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Shimizu's half.
In the minute 40, Cristiano for Kashiwa drives towards goal at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Masaaki Toma awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
In Kashiwa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 43, Kashiwa are coming forward and Cristiano gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Shimizu at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Shimizu's Carlinhos Junior gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Kashiwa defender.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
In the minute 45, Shimizu's Carlinhos Junior gets in a shot on goal at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Masaaki Toma blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
In the minute 46, Nelsinho Baptista (Kashiwa) is making a first substitution, with Yuta Someya replacing Tatsuya Yamashita.
Nelsinho Baptista is making the team's second substitution at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium with Yusuke Kobayashi replacing Hidekazu Otani.
The home team replace Ataru Esaka with Yuta Kamiya.
In the minute 48, Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kenta Nishizawa (Shimizu) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Kashiwa in the half of Shimizu.
In the minute 51, Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 57, In Kashiwa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
In the minute 60, Yusuke Segawa is on a sub for Masatoshi Mihara for Kashiwa.
Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
Free kick Shimizu.
In the minute 63, Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Shimizu.
In Kashiwa Shimizu attack through Carlinhos Junior. The finish is off target, however.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Shimizu.
Yusuke Segawa of Kashiwa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Masaaki Toma signals a throw-in for Shimizu, close to Kashiwa's area.
In the minute 70, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Teerasil Dangda is replacing Shota Kaneko for Shimizu at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
The away team have replaced Yusuke Goto with Yuito Suzuki. This is the second substitution made today by Peter Cklamovski.
In the minute 73, In Kashiwa Shimizu drive forward through Teerasil Dangda. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Shimizu have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
In the minute 76, Throw-in Shimizu.
Free kick for Shimizu in the half of Kashiwa.
Shimizu's Kenta Nishizawa misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 78, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashiwa.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 80, Kashiwa make their fifth substitution with Kengo Kitazume replacing Naoki Kawaguchi.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Kashiwa pushes forward through Yuta Kamiya, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 83, Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
Yuta Someya (Kashiwa) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashiwa.
In the minute 84, Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Yuta Kamiya gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kashiwa.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 87, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Kashiwa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shimizu's half?
In the minute 88, Shimizu have a goal kick.
Ryo Takeuchi is replacing Renato Augusto for the away team.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Throw-in for Shimizu close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
In Kashiwa Kashiwa drive forward through Cristiano. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
Shimizu's Carlinhos Junior breaks free at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 0-0.
